hero.title: Study in Australia - Land Down Under
hero.description: Join an entire continent of opportunities - 2.5 million global graduates, world-class universities, and pathways to permanent residency

whyStudy.title: Why Choose Australia for Higher Education?
whyStudy.description: Australia offers world-class education, stunning natural beauty, and unmatched quality of life, making it one of the most livable countries globally.

points.title: Entire Continent Country
points.description: Australia spans an entire continent with diverse landscapes, climates, and opportunities. Most livable cities are located in pleasant coastal areas.

points.title: Multicultural Society
points.description: Nearly 25% of Australians are from overseas - UK, China, Vietnam, North Africa, and Middle East, creating one of the world's most multicultural nations.

points.title: World-Class Universities
points.description: Australia has produced over 2.5 million global graduates with spectacular campuses equipped with all amenities and industry connections.

points.title: Sunny Climate & Lifestyle
points.description: Australia's vast open areas with sunny climate make it highly livable. Perfect work-life balance with outdoor activities year-round.

points.title: Work Opportunities
points.description: Students can work 48 hours per fortnight during studies. Post-study work visas and pathways to permanent residency available.

points.title: Migration Opportunities
points.description: Strong pathways to permanent residency through skilled migration programs. Australia actively seeks skilled professionals in various fields.
